p.d: Devo, live at The Observatory in Los Angeles, delivering a spectacle jammed with hits old and new, gloriously oddball antics and their mental mascot, Booji Boy. A contagious collision of New Wave punk, arty experimentalism and subversive politics, these music mavericks burst onto the world scene in the late '70s and turned pop music on its head forever with hits like 'Whip It', 'Girl U Want', 'Mongoloid' and 'Beautiful World'.
